pdf.head:

<#elseif .locale == "zh_TW">
<#elseif .locale == "ja_JP">
<#elseif .locale == "ko_KR">
<#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
</#if>
${record@title}
${subsidiary.name}
<#if subsidiary.mainaddress_text?length != 0> ${subsidiary.mainaddress_text}
${subsidiary.phone}
${subsidiary.email} <#if subsidiary.id == "3">accounts.uk@kamadojoe.com</#if>
<#if subsidiary.id == "3" && record.location.id != "225"> Our VAT Registration # GB 292 5730 83 <#elseif subsidiary.id == "3" && record.location.id == "225"> Our VAT Registration # NL 825 8328 95 B01 </#if> </#if>
Page of
pdf.body:
${record.billaddress@label} ${record.shipaddress@label}
${record.billaddress}
VAT: ${record.custbody23} ${record.shipaddress}
${record.billphone}
Invoice Date ${record.trandate}
Account <#if record.entityname?length != 0>${record.entityname?split(" ")[0]} </#if>
${record.terms@label} ${record.terms}
${record.otherrefnum@label} ${record.otherrefnum}
Sales Order <#if record.createdfrom?length > 0>${record.createdfrom?substring(13,record.createdfrom?length)} </#if>
${record.shipmethod@label} ${record.shipmethod}
${record.shipdate@label} ${record.shipdate}
${record.salesrep@label} ${record.salesrep}
${record@title} ${record.tranid} Payment Due ${record.duedate}
<#if record.item?has_content>
<#list record.item as itemline><#if itemline.item?length gt 0><#if itemline_index==0>
Quantity ${itemline.item@label} <#if record.custbody_tariff_code_summary?string =="Yes"> Tariff Code </#if> <#if record.custbody_tariff_code_summary?string =="Yes"> Unit Weight</#if> ${itemline.taxrate1@label} Unit Rate ${itemline.amount@label}
</#if>
${itemline.quantity} ${itemline.item}
${itemline.description} <#if record.custbody_tariff_code_summary?string =="Yes"> ${itemline.custcol_tariff_code} </#if> <#if record.custbody_tariff_code_summary?string =="Yes"> ${itemline.custcol_unit_weight} ${itemline.custcol_weight_units} </#if> ${itemline.taxrate1} ${itemline.rate} ${itemline.amount}
</#if></#list> </#if>
<#if record.discounttotal?length != 0>
<#else>
</#if> <#if subsidiary.internalid?string == "3">Payment Information:
<#if record.currency == "British pound" && (record.terms == "Prepay" || record.terms == "Direct 30" || record.terms == "Direct 60" || record.terms == "Direct 90" || record.terms == "MM30" || record.terms == "MM60" || record.terms == "MM90")> Your prompt payment is greatly appreciated
